name: Meteorite (VilMan Studios) (VilMan Studios)
description:
Meteorite is an endless game where's the objective is to destroy meteorites falling from space to the planet by tapping on them and sending rocket to destroy it!

Currency:

The main currency in the Game is count of the people you saved. You can unlock more planets by saving more people! There's also coins that you get from destroying golden meteorite.  Save it up, It will be very useful in the future.

Score:

The score system is simple - The more you destroy, the more score you have. By destroying simple meteorite you will get 1 point, and by destroying the golden one, you will get 2 points. The goal is to score as much as you can. Can you make it to 100?

Difficulty:

Difficulty increases when you score more points. In the beginning it's easy enough, but as you get more score the meteorites starts falling faster and a lot more often! Be careful and don't destroy your planet!

Planets:

There is 5 planets available in the game now. Once you save enough people you can proceed to another one!

...

The game teaches you to improve your reaction, dexterity, and It's really fun to play. Download now to start your own adventure!
